feat.value: Coptic SCRIPTORIUM's corpus of Acephalous Work 22 begins with this fragment. A number of known extant fragments prior to this one exist, however, in the surviving codices of vol. 3 of Shenoute's Canons; they have not yet been digitized. Additionally, there are several lacunae and several undigitized extant fragments between this fragment and the next digitized fragment of Acephalous Work 22 in our corpus.
